DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to observe the effect of square dance on rheumatoid arthritis.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Square Dance on Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: had wrist and/or MCP involvement aged 18 years diagnosed by rheumatology consultants with RA severe psychological difficulties currently receiving mental health care any medical condition that might prevent them from safely exercising (e.g. history of more severe heart, lung or cerebrovascular disease) previously attended an education programme had a Modified Health Assessment Questionnaire score above 2 (03)
